definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

sentences.english: On such a hot summer, another good news arrived at Somso.
sentences.chinese: 热情似火的夏天，西堡酒庄又传来喜讯。

sentences.english: More good news for airlines, and passengers too.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司的喜讯，也是乘客的喜讯。

sentences.english: More good news for airlines, and passengers too.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司的喜讯，也是乘客的喜讯。

sentences.english: His happiness was consummated when he heard the good news.
sentences.chinese: 他听到喜讯后快乐到极点。

sentences.english: The tragedy of freedom is the evangel for its enemy.
sentences.chinese: 如题自由的灾难是自由敌人的莫大喜讯。

sentences.english: Blackburn received the news in a 2am phone call.
sentences.chinese: 布莱克本在凌晨2点通过电话获知这一喜讯。

sentences.english: Send our dear ones the happy news.
People broke into cheers as soon as they heard the good news.
sentences.chinese: 喜讯传来，人们顿时欢呼起来。

sentences.english: When the good news reached Lankao, the whole country rejoiced.
sentences.chinese: 喜讯传到兰考，全县人民都欢欣鼓舞。

sentences.english: The good news in the circle of friends to hear Wu Jing Xie Nan, have also forwarded micro-blog congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 圈中好友闻听吴京谢楠的喜讯，也纷纷转发微博祝贺。

sentences.english: Also on the first day, European planemaker Airbus got some good news.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲飞机制造商空客在航展的第一天就有喜讯传来。

sentences.english: Mr Clark was so happy when his son was born that he shouted the news from the housetops.
sentences.chinese: 克拉克先生添了个儿子，高兴得将喜讯告诉大家。

sentences.english: Thursday's weather forecast brought some good news for parts of France - rain.
sentences.chinese: 星期四下雨的气象预报为法国部分地区带来喜讯。

sentences.english: A pleasant surprise awaits him in today’s mail.
sentences.chinese: 今天的邮件中一个意想不到的喜讯即将降临到他身上。

sentences.english: And many other things exhorting, did he preach to the people.
sentences.chinese: 他还讲了许多别的劝言，给百姓传报喜讯。

sentences.english: People broke into cheers at once when they heard the good news.
sentences.chinese: 喜讯传来，人们顿时欢呼起来。

definition: two simultaneous happy events in the family
to announce good news/to report success
report of success/report of a victory

(of news etc) so thrilling that everyone is rejoicing and spreading the word (Internet slang)/acronym from 喜聞樂見|喜闻乐见[xi3 wen2 le4 jian4], 大快人心[da4 kuai4 ren2 xin1], 普天同慶|普天同庆[pu3 tian1 tong2 qing4] and 奔走相告[ben1 zou3 xiang1 gao4]
to add a son to the family
to congratulate respectfully/to express good wishes
to tie the knot (idiom)/to get married
joy from heaven (idiom); overjoyed at unexpected good news/unlooked-for happy event
